import React from 'react' import { banner } from '../assets/images' import { useTypewriter, Cursor } from "react-simple-typewriter"; const Banner = () => { const [text] = useTypewriter({ words: ["Welcome to ShopHub", "Flutter Developer", "Python Developer"], loop: true, typeSpeed: 20, deleteSpeed: 10, delaySpeed: 2000, }); return (

{text}

Super Value Deals

On all Products

Buy more & save more

) } export default Banner
